message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to get your hands on something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $20000. I think it's a fair price considering its value and rarity.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, but I believe I can offer you a fair price of $15000 for it.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not willing to sell it to you for $15000. I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $18000. I think this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value and uniqueness.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I would like to propose a price of $16000. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to sell the product for $16000. I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $17500. I think this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value and uniqueness.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $16500. I hope this helps us reach an agreement.
